column4: Hi.  I munged my sudousers file.   I tried using the livecd as a rescue, but once there I can't find /etc on my hardrive ( as opposed to the disc ).  I guess I need to mount my hard drive.  Any ideas how to do this or where to read about it?
I suggest you boot in recovery mode instead of from the CD. That way, you'll have access to /etc as normal.
during the boot, after the BIOS messages, you can get to the grub menu (may need to press Esc). Recovery is an option you can select from that menu.
Thanks I will give it a shot, bye
